info.name: DuckDuckGo - Jim Can Read It!
info.description:
Hide top-of-page Ads. Improved contrast, colors, and font size for folks like me that cannot read, for instance, light grey text on a lighter grey background or very small fonts.

Keywords: High Contrast, Readability, Light Theme, Lite Theme, Dark Font, Better Contrast, DuckDuckGo
info.additionalInfo:
DuckDuckGo - Jim Can Read It! 
        
  Ver: 1.0 Date: 2018-06-12 Initial release
